titleStmt.title: Choice new songs, never before printed set to several new tunes by the best masters of music / written by Tho. D'Urfey.
titleStmt.author: D'Urfey, Thomas, 1653-1723.
Playford, John, 1623-1686?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Playford for Joseph Hindmarsh,

notesStmt.note: Songs by Abell, Ackroyde, Draghi, Farmer, Grabu, King, Paisible, and anonymous. Cf. Day and Murrie. Songbooks.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
